title: Drawing, "A Saint's Vision of the Cross", ca. 1800–20
medium: Pen and brown ink on paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Saint, cherubim at his feet, is guided by an angel to look up into the parting clouds to a vision of the Christ carrying the Cross and Mary.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "A Saint's Vision of the Cross", ca. 1800–20.
ca. 1800–20. Pen and brown ink on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-5669.
